components.tooltip: When checked, the requests and its results will be stored in the cache and if the Reporting will try to make the request to the same URL with the same paremetrs, the cached data will be returned. It allows to increase performance, but if the remote source's data is changing quite often and you always need to keep it up-to-date, uncheck this option.

components.html:
Grouping

You can create a grouped report that is to group the Data Source Forms submissions by one or several fields (e.g. department ID or employee ID). Using the UI below, just select the fields that will be used as criteria for the grouping and add some columns to your Reporting Grid that will be calculated per group based on the existing Data Source Forms fields or the Grid Calculated Extra Fields. 

** Please note that only Grouping Fields and Group Calculated Columns will be available to display in the Reporting Grid for grouped reports.

components.label: Decimal Places
components.tooltip: Enter the number of decimal places for the calculated value. If the original calculated value has more decimal places, the value will be rounded.

components.label: Available Columns
components.tooltip: Add columns that you would like to have available for display in the Reporting UI Grid. The columns will display in the Reproting Grid in the order, they are added here.

components.label: Display Title
components.tooltip: This title will be shown in the Reporting UI. If not set, original component title will be used.

components.label: Default Columns
components.tooltip: Default columns will be displayed in the Reporting UI Grid when it is just loaded. If not set, all available columns will be displayed.

components.label: Enable Controls
components.tooltip: When checked, special Controls UI will display to manage the Reporting Grid. The Controls additional settings can be configured in the Filtering and Actions sections.

components.label: Controls Title
components.tooltip: This title will be displayed for the Controls Panel.

components.label: Collapse Controls Panel Initially
components.tooltip: If checked, the Controls` Panel will initially be collapsed.

components.label: Filter Label Position
components.tooltip: Position for the labels of the Controls Filter Fields.

components.label: Reporting Filters
components.tooltip: Add the fields by which you want to filter the Reporting Grid. Those filter will display in the Reporerting Controls UI.

components.label: Filter Type
components.tooltip: Select filter operator you want to apply for filtering the field.

components.label: Filter Title
components.tooltip: This title will be displayed next to the filter. If not set, the label of the filter field is used.

components.label: Actions
components.tooltip: Actions will be displayed in Actions of the Controls UI and will be applied for selected rows in the Reporting Grid.
